subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brian Johnson passed for 312 yards and a touchdown and Darrell Mack ran for a career-high 163 yards and 3 scores for Utah last night in a 44-35 victory at Louisville. The Utes (3-3) rolled up 582 yards. Brian Brohm was 39 of 58 for 467 yards and 4 touchdowns for the Cardinals (3-3).
